title: Microsoft Lures Meta's Talent Pool With Multimillion-Dollar Pay Packages As The AI War Heats Up: Report
description: Microsoft is aggressively targeting top AI talent from Meta by offering multimillion-dollar bonuses amid a $240 billion industry-wide surge in AI spending, intensifying the battle for supremacy in artificial intelligence.
content: Microsoft Corporation MSFT is reportedly ramping up its battle for artificial intelligence supremacy by aggressively targeting top AI talent from Meta Platforms, Inc. META, offering multimillion-dollar pay packages to secure key engineers and researc... [2934 chars]

title: Satellite images reveal conditions that contributed to 'catastrophic' season
description: Images from space and artificial intelligence can help detect areas prone to extreme wildfires, researchers suggest, after satellite photos showed dry parts of Manitoba ahead of its devastating wildfire season.
content: The use of images from space and artificial intelligence can help in detecting areas that may be prone to extreme wildfires, researchers suggest. A fire burns as fire crews continue to fight wildfires around Lac du Bonnet, Man., Thursday, May 15, 202... [3528 chars]

title: Perplexity AI offers Google $34.5 bn for Chrome browser
description: Perplexity AI offered Google on Tuesday $34.5 billion for its popular Chrome web browser, which the internet giant could potentially be forced to sell as part of antitrust proceedings.The potential of Chrome being weakened or spun off comes as rivals such as Microsoft, ChatGPT and Perplexity put generative artificial intelligence (AI) to work fetching information from the internet in response to user queries.
content:
A US judge is expected to decide soon whether to order Google to sell its globally popular Chrome browser to weaken the tech firm's dominance in online search (Brandon Bell) (Brandon Bell/GETTY IMAGES NORTH AMERICA/Getty Images via AFP)
Perplexity AI... [3003 chars]
